text: Corey Baldwin (born 13 October 1998) is a Welsh rugby union player who plays for Exeter Chiefs as a winger/centre. Baldwin made his senior debut in 2016 for Llandovery against Bedwas as a replacement. Just a month later, he made his debut for the Scarlets, scoring a try in the Anglo-Welsh Cup game against the Newport Gwent Dragons.http://www.scarlets.co.uk/eng/games/11705.php In 2017, Baldwin was named in the Wales U20 squad for the first time. Much like his Scarlets debut, Baldwin scored in his first game for the Wales U20s, which was a 65-34 victory over Scotland U20 On 2 March 2020, Baldwin will join Exeter Chiefs in the English Premiership Rugby competition from the 2020-21 season. == References == == External links == *Scarlets profile Category:People from Surrey Category:Welsh rugby union players Category:Scarlets players Category:Living people Category:1998 births
title: Corey Baldwin
